body_html: We could probably do something like generate a class per THCGenerateXType that doesn't have any functionality, but it just used for template-dispatch if we wanted. But most of the code in TensorUtils isn't even data-type specific, so this approach seemed better to start with.
body_text: We could probably do something like generate a class per THCGenerateXType that doesn't have any functionality, but it just used for template-dispatch if we wanted.  But most of the code in TensorUtils isn't even data-type specific, so this approach seemed better to start with.
